Text: My god the screens look awesome. I can only imagine the audio being the same. Buuuutt. Can someone briefly explain how to convert this from MP4 to Avi, so it can play on Xbox please?
what no mp4 capability on Xbox, Should have went with the PS3, mine plays mp4 beautifully.

But anyhow , thanks for the Up Acesn8s, and I was just wondering, how the hell is everyone these days, been with TPB since the beginning and Its been awhile since Ive given A shout out the all the Skull heads providing all these wonderful goodies,So thanks

You need a software solution to convert to .avi. 

I use 'Pazera Free MP4 to AVI Converter'.

Simply drag the .mp4 file onto the shortcut (or open the program and drag the file(s) onto it), click on 'convert' and it'll do the rest. 

The settings for deciding where you want the new .avi to go and whether to create a new file or overwrite the .mp4 are all obvious.
